This is a testharness.js-based test.

PASS Adjacent with universal selector 
PASS Indirect adjacent with universal selector 
PASS Adjacent with universal :hover selector 
PASS Class change affecting selector for sibling class 
PASS Class change affecting all sibling subtrees through a universal selector 
PASS Class change affecting all sibling subtrees through an indirect adjacent combinator 
PASS Class change affecting sibling descendants through a universal selector 
PASS Class change affecting universal descendants of webkit-any sibling 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
